title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Golden Gate National Recreation Area, California
content:
Photo submitted by Jason Craig, “Just me and my Lynskey Backroad taking a water break before climbing out from the Kirby Cove campground and ascending local fav Hawk Hill.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Golden Gate National Recreation Area, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
